definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: But be content with the oblation or tithes, which I have separated for their uses and necessities.
sentences.chinese: 因为他只借一次奉献，就永远使被圣化的人得以成全。

sentences.english: Our homes should be among the most hallowed of all earthly sanctuaries .
sentences.chinese: 我们的家会是今生被圣化的最好的庇护所。

sentences.english: Let the moment of meeting be sanctified by the remembrance of God.
sentences.chinese: 让我们以忆念神来圣化相遇的那一刹那。

sentences.english: It treats the theme more in terms of the sanctification of human nature in Christ.
sentences.chinese: 它更多的将这点看成是人性在基督里的圣化。

sentences.english: Opus Dei urges priests and laypeople to strenuously pursue sanctification through everyday discipline.
sentences.chinese: 它要求牧师及俗人通过日常的规矩来努力追求圣化。

sentences.english: For by one oblation he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
sentences.chinese: 因为他只借一次奉献，就永远使被圣化的人得以成全。
